column1: Does the child recognize individual letters when shown in different colors or fonts?
Can the child name any letters of the alphabet independently?
How well does the child connect sounds with the corresponding letters (like 'A' for 'Apple')?
Is the child able to repeat simple words or phrases after hearing them?
How comfortable is the child with identifying objects in pictures when named?
Does the child enjoy listening to stories or rhymes?
Can the child follow a simple 2-3 word instruction (like “Give me the ball”)?
Does the child recognize their name when spoken or called out?
